Posts.EditableText:
I would like to "bump" my useful threads thread over to the new forums, but the purpose of that is so people can find solution to common problems in one thread.  I tried to copy-paste that thread over to the new forum, but when I copy-paste the links to solved threads in the new forum into a new address bar, the address is not recognized.

Is there a way that I can share those links or are they dead forever?

Here is an example link:  viewtopic.php?f=10&t=5707&start=15

I might be missing something...
Posts.HTML:
I would like to "bump" my useful threads thread over to the new forums, but the purpose of that is so people can find solution to common problems in one thread. I tried to copy-paste that thread over to the new forum, but when I copy-paste the links to solved threads in the new forum into a new address bar, the address is not recognized.

Is there a way that I can share those links or are they dead forever?
